text.p: Giovanni Grimaldi - (built 1992) 135,500 dwt 14 on 55 del Continent 8-13/9 La Cienaga r/v approx. $10,400 daily HMM.
Thetis - (built 1993) 73,600 dwt 13.5 on 32 plus 1.5 Continent prompt two to four months redel Atlantic $9,000/$9,250 daily Guinomar.
Joyous Society - (built 1994) 69,274 dwt 14.5 on 31 plus 1.5 del Cape Lambert 1-10/9 trip Baltimore $3,500 daily plus $30,000 bb Shinwa.
Oakby - (built 1983) 64,197 dwt 13.5 on 32 plus 2.5 del USG 5-10 trip Far East $11,500 daily plus $155,000 bb South Korean.
Noble Fortune - (built 1974) 64,173 dwt 13 on 32 plus 2.5 del North China trip viua Qinhuangdao redel South Korea $6,800 daily South Korean charterers.
Golden Glow - (built 1981) 63,990 dwt 13 on 34 plus 2.5 del Singapore prompt two to three laden legs $7,000/$7,250 daily Pan Ocean.
Konkar Star - (built 1985) 69,582 dwt 13.5 on 33 plus two del Gibraltar prompt Transatlantic r/v redel Gibraltar-Skaw $8,000 daily Navios (recent).
Meridian Sky - (built 1989) 64,293 dwt del Antwerp 25-20/8 two to four months redel Atlantic $8,250 daily first 55 days $8,750 balance Navios.
Despina - (built 1993) 65,644 dwt 14 on 32 plus one del Gibraltar end August two to four months redel Atlantic 48,900 daily Guinonmar.
Angelic Spirit - (built 1983) 65,767 dwt 13.5 on 33 del USG 2-5/9 trip South Korea $11,000 daily plus $150,000 bb Pan Ocean.
